line.text:
Planned Work
[3] Trains run local in both directions between 34 St-Penn Station and Chambers St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Apr 27 - 28

• Please allow additional travel time.

Reminder: Late night service runs express between 148 St and Times Sq-42 St.




Planned Work
[2] Trains run local in both directions between 34 St-Penn Station and Chambers St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Apr 27 - 28

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Work
[2] Flatbush Av-bound trains run express from E 180 St to 3 Av-149 St

Weekend, 3:45 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun, Apr 27 - 28

For service to E Tremont Av, 174, Freeman, Simpson Sts, Intervale, Prospect and Jackson Avs,
take the [2] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to a Wakefield-bound [2].

For service from these stations, take the [2] to E 180 St and transfer to a Flatbush Av-bound [2].

Note: No [5] trains at these stations during this time.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[1] No trains between 14 St and South Ferry

[2] [3] trains and free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekend, 11:30 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 26 - 29

[1] service operates between 242 St and 14 St.
• Uptown trains skip 18, 23 and 28 Sts.
• Downtown trains skip 28, 23 and 18 Sts, days and evenings.

[SB] buses make stops between Chambers St and South Ferry.

Travel Alternatives

For 28, 23, 18, Christopher, Houston, Canal, Franklin and Chambers Sts,
take the [2] or [3]* making these stops during this time.

• Transfer between [1] and [2] [3] trains at Times Sq-42 St (across the platform) or 14 St.
• Transfer between [2] [3] trains and free shuttle buses at Chambers St.

StationShuttle Bus Stop
Chambers St [ad] [2] [3]West Broadway at Chambers St

Cortlandt StBroadway at Cortlandt St (toward South Ferry)
Church St at Cortlandt St (toward Chambers St)
Rector StBroadway at Rector St (toward South Ferry)
Trinity Pl at Rector St (toward Chambers St) 
Bowling Green [ad] [4]State St at Battery Pl
South Ferry-Whitehall St [R]Water St at Whitehall St

Note: At 14 St, [1] trains board at the downtown platform.

*Reminder: Late night [3] service runs express between 148 St and Times Sq-42 St.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[1] Downtown trains skip 28 St, 23 St and 18 St

Weekend, 6 AM to 12 midnight, Sat and Sun, Apr 27 - 28

[2] [3] trains make local stops between 34 St-Penn Station and Chambers St.

For service to these stations, transfer to the [2] or [3] at Times Sq-42 St.

For service from these stations, take the [2] or [3] instead.

Note: No [1] trains between 14 St and South Ferry during this time.

Planned Work
[6] Pelham Bay Park-bound trains skip 23 St, 28 St and 33 St

Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Apr 29

For service to these stations, take the [6] to Grand Central-42 St
and transfer to a downtown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 14 St-Union Sq
and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].




Planned Work
[5] No trains between E 180 St and Bowling Green

[2] and [4] trains provide alternate service
Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Apr 27 - 28

[5] Service operates between Dyre Av and E 180 St.

[2] trains make stops* between E 180 St and 149 St-Grand Concourse.
[4] trains make stops* between 149 St-Grand Concourse and Bowling Green.

• Transfer between [5] and [2] trains at E 180 St.
• Transfer between [2] and [4] trains at 149 St-Grand Concourse.

*Please review [2] [4] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[4] Crown Heights/New Lots Av-bound trains skip 138 St-Grand Concourse

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 26 - 29

For service to this station, take the [4] to 125 St and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].

For service from this station, take the [4] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer
to a Crown Heights/New Lots Av-bound [4].

Notes: At 149 St-Grand Concourse, all trains board at the Woodlawn-bound platform.
No [5] trains at this station during this time.

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work
[C] No trains between 145 St and 168 St

Weekends, Saturday and Sunday, until Apr 28

Service operates between Euclid Av and 145 St.

[A] trains make local stops at 155 St and 163 St.

• Transfer between trains at 145 St.

Note: No [A] trains between 168 St and 207 St during this time.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[C] Euclid Av-bound trains skip 50 St, 23 St and Spring St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Apr 27 - 28

For service to 50 St, take the [C] to 42 St and transfer to an uptown [C] or [E].

For service to 23 St, transfer to the [E] at 42 St (across the platform).

For service from these stations, take the [E]. Transfer to the [C] at 42 St or 14 St.

For Spring St, take the [E] or [F]*. Transfer between trains at W 4 St or Canal St.

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.




Planned Work
[C] Manhattan-bound trains skip Shepherd Av, Van Siclen Av and Liberty Av

Weekends, Saturday and Sunday, Apr 27 - 28 • May 4 - 5

For service to these stations, take the [C] to Broadway Junction and transfer to a Euclid Av-bound [C].

For service from these stations, take the [C] to Euclid Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [C].




Planned Work
[A] No trains between 168 St and 207 St

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Apr 29

[A] Service operates between Lefferts Blvd/Howard Beach and 168 St,
making local stops at 155 St and 163 St.

[SB] Broadway Shuttle Buses make all stops between 168 St and 207 St.
[SB] Fort Washington Av Shuttle Buses make all stops between 168 St and 190 St.

• Transfer between buses and trains at 168 St.

Sandy Reroute  Posted: 04/27/2013  3:35PM

Until further notice:

[A] No trains between Howard Beach-JFK/Broad Channel and the Rockaways due to damage sustained during hurricane Sandy.

Free shuttle buses operate nonstop between Howard Beach [A] and Mott Av [H] Stations.

[H] Free shuttle trains operate between Mott Av and Beach 90 St, days and evenings.

Q22  buses provide local service in the Rockaways.

Find out more at:  http://www.mta.info/nyct/service/RebuildingRockawaysAfterHurricanSandy.htm

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/27/2013  3:34PM

Due to track maintenance at Union Street, some northbound [N] trains are running on the [Q] line from Coney Island-Stillwell Av to DeKalb Av

Some northbound [D] trains are running on the [F] line from Coney Island-Stillwell Av to Washington Square- 4 Street.

Allow additional travel time.

 

 



Planned Work
[F] Coney Island-bound trains run via the [A] from W 4 St to Jay St-MetroTech

Weekend, 10:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 26 - 29

For service to B'way-Lafayette St, transfer to the [D] at W 4 St.

For service to 2 Av, Delancey St, East Broadway and York St, take the [F] to Jay St-MetroTech
and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from these stations, take the [F] to W 4 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].




Planned Work
[F] Coney Island-bound trains run via the [M] from Roosevelt Av to 47-50 Sts

Weekend, 11:15 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 26 - 29

Trains run express from Roosevelt Av to Queens Plaza.

No Coney Island-bound [F] service at 21 St-Queensbridge, Roosevelt Island,
Lexington Av/63 St and 57 St.

Travel Alternatives

For service to these stations, take the [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from 21 St-Queensbridge and Roosevelt Island, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

From Lexington Av/63 St, use the nearby 59 St [4] [5] [6] Station for downtown local service
to 51 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F] at the [E] [M] platform.

From 57 St, use the nearby 57 St-7 Av [N] [Q] [R] Station for downtown service to
34 St-Herald Sq where Coney Island-bound [F] service is available.

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: G
line.text:
Planned Work
[G] Trains run every 20 minutes between Court Sq and Bedford-Nostrand Avs

Weekend, 5 AM to 11:59 PM, Sat and Sun, Apr 27 - 28

The last stop for some trains headed toward Court Sq is Bedford-Nostrand Avs

• Transfer at Bedford-Nostrand Avs to continue your trip.

Note: At Greenpoint Av, all trains board at the Church Av-bound platform.

line.name: JZ
line.text:
Planned Work
[J] Service operates in two sections:

1. Between Jamaica Center and Essex St
2. Between Essex St and Chambers St, every 20 minutes
Weekend, 12:45 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Apr 27 - 29

• Transfer at Essex St to continue your trip.

Due to track maintenance at Union Street, some northbound [N] trains are running on the [Q] line from Coney Island-Stillwell Av to DeKalb Av

Some northbound [D] trains are running on the [F] line from Coney Island-Stillwell Av to Washington Square- 4 Street.

Allow additional travel time.

 

 



Planned Work
[R] Forest Hills-bound trains run express from 36 St to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, April 27 - 28

For service to 25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St and Union St, take the [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr
and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].

For service from these stations, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Forest Hills-bound [R].

~ For late night travel at these stations, see [D] [N] advisories.

line.name: SIR
line.text:
Planned Work
[SIR] Trains may not connect with the Staten Island Ferry

Weekend, 9 PM Fri to 4 AM Mon, Apr 26 - 29

Due to planned system maintenance, trains will depart St. George Terminal without delay.

• Please allow additional travel time.

Schedule | pdf

Note: At Pleasant Plains, Prince's Bay, Huguenot, Annadale and Eltingville, all trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform.

line.text:

B44 buses detoured due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Nostrand Av
at Avenue H.

Northbound: Buses will make stops along
Flatbush Av at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.

Until further notice

Buses will not stop on Old Fulton St at Prospect St.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board on
Henry St at Cranberry St or Old Fulton St at Hicks St.

locations.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/27/2013  3:38PM

M50 bus detoured due to crane activity on E 50 St between Madison Av and Park Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Via 50 St, left on Madison Av, right on E 54 St, right on Lexington Av, left on E 50 St and then regular route.

There will be no service between Madison Av and Park Av. All buses will be making corresponding stops along detour route.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 04/27/2013  3:36PM

M9 and M22 bus service detoured due to road work on Warren St between Church St & Broadway.

Detour is as follows:

M9 Northbound and M22 Eastbound: Via Warren St, right on W Broadway, left on Park Pl to Broadway and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.

 



Planned Detour
M50 buses detoured due to a crane operation

Weekend, 6 AM Sat to 9 PM Sun, Apr 27 - 28

Buses are being detoured from E 48 St between
1 and 2 Avs.

Eastbound: No bus stops will be missed.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M31 and M86 buses detoured due a crane operation

Weekend, 6 AM to 9 PM, Sat and Sun, Apr 27 - 28

Buses are being detoured from 91 St between
York and 1 Avs.

Eastbound: Buses will make stops along 1 Av
between 86 and 92 Sts.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M31 bus stop change

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the York Av at 61 St stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board
on 62 St at York Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 bus temporary bus stop closure due to the Brooklyn Bridge Project

Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 6 AM Mon, Apr 27 - 29

Buses will not stop on Frankfort and William Sts.

Eastbound: Customers are advised to board on
Frankfort and Pearl Sts.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 bus stop change due to construction

Until further notice

Temporary bus stop change due to construction.

M22 Westbound: Buses will bypass stops on
Chambers St at Church St and West Broadway.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project Phase II

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Chambers St between
North End Av and Broadway.

Eastbound: Buses will make stops along Warren St
between North End Av and West St.

On Warren St between Broadway and Church St at
corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to the Chelsea Visiting Neighbors 8th Avenue Festival

Weekend, 9 AM to 8 PM, Saturday, Apr 27

Buses are being detoured from 8 Av between 14 and 23 Sts.

Northbound: Buses will make stops along 6 Av between 14
and 23 Sts at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 bus stop closure due to the Tribeca Film Festival

All times until 11:59 PM Mon, Apr 29

Buses will not stop on Chambers St at West St.

Northbound: Customers are advised to board
on West at Harrison St.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to the Tribeca Film Festival

Beginning, 6 PM Thu to 12 AM Sun, Apr 25 - 28

Buses are being detoured from Harrison St between
West and Hudson Sts.

Northbound: Buses will make all stops along West
St at corresponding locations.

Note: During detour all buses will temporarily use the
X7 and X9 bus stop on West St at North Moore St.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 bus stop closure

Until further notice

Buses will not make the stop on 7 Av South at
Waverly Pl between Charles and Perry Sts.

M20 Southbound: Buses will make stops on
7 Av South at 10 and 12 Sts.




Planned Detour
M5 and M20 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops on State St on the far side of Whitehall and Water Sts
and on the near side of Broad St are temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the State St at Whitehall St bus stop, customers
are advised to board southbound on State St near the South Ferry
Terminal entrance.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from West Broadway at
Chambers St.

Southbound: Buses will make stops on Reade St
and West Broadway.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M15 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops along South St at Broad and Whitehall Sts are
temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the Broad St and Whitehall St stops,
customers are advised to board at the South Ferry Terminal.

For the Water St at Broad St bus stop, customers are advised
to board at Old Slip.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M1, M2, M3, M4 and Q32 buses detoured due to the Sikh Cultural Society Parade and Festival

Weekend, 10 AM to 7 PM, Saturday, Apr 27

Buses are being detoured from Madison Av between
E 23 and E 38 Sts.

M1, M3, M3 Northbound: Buses will make stops along
Park Av South/Park Av at corresponding locations.

M4 Northbound/Q32 Eastbound: Buses will make stops
along 6 Av at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/27/2013  3:39PM

Q32 bus detoured due to crane operation on 60 St between Park Av and Madison Av.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via 60 St, left on Park Av to 57 St, right on 57 St to Madison Av, right on Madison Av to 60 St, left on 60 St and then regular route.

All buses will be making corresponding stops at 60 St and Lexington Av or 60 St and Madison Av.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 04/27/2013  3:37PM

Q104 bus service detoured due to construction on 48 St at 37 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Northbound: Via 47 St, left on 39 Av, right on 43 St, right on 37 Av, left on 48 St and regular route.

Southbound: Via 48 St, right on 37 Av, left on 43 St, left on 39 Av, right on 48 St and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 04/27/2013  3:37PM

Q16 bus detoured due to construction on Francis Lewis Blvd at 29 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via Francis Lewis Blvd, right on 171 St, right on 29 Av and regular route. 

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
Q10 Lefferts Blvd Branch to be limited stop only

Beginning, Sunday, Apr 28

All Q10 Lefferts Blvd Branch local buses will change to
limited stop to provide faster, more consistent service.
The Q10 limited will give exclusive service to the Lefferts
Blvd Branch south of Rockaway Blvd in South Ozone Pk.

The hours of service for the Q10 Limited will be expanded
5:30 am to 11:30 pm on weekdays
6:15 am to 11:30 pm on Saturdays and Sundays

Q10 limited bus stop added in both directions
• Lefferts Blvd and 150 Av

Q10 local only bus stops on the Lefferts Blvd
Branch to be discontinued:
• Lefferts Blvd at Sutter Av, 133 Av and 149 Av

Q10 local service will continue to operate via the
130 St branch. Service on the 130 St branch will
remain unchanged.




Planned Detour
M1, M2, M3, M4 and Q32 buses detoured due to the Sikh Cultural Society Parade and Festival

Weekend, 10 AM to 7 PM, Saturday, Apr 27

Buses are being detoured from Madison Av between
E 23 and E 38 Sts.

M1, M3, M3 Northbound: Buses will make stops along
Park Av South/Park Av at corresponding locations.

M4 Northbound/Q32 Eastbound: Buses will make stops
along 6 Av at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.

Weekend, 9:30 AM to 7:30 PM, Saturday, Apr 27

line.name: Bronx-Whitestone
line.text: DUE TO HEAVY VOLUME  DELAYS ON THE BWB BOTH DIRECTIONS  EXPECT DELAYS

line.name: Hempstead
line.text:
Hempstead Branch Customers

Buses are replacing eastbound trains at Queens Village & Hollis this weekend to accommodate trackwork. Westbound service is not affected. For details, please pick up a copy of the special Hempstead Branch timetable or see http://bit.ly/10l2hIR.

line.name: Oyster Bay
line.text:
Oyster Bay Branch Customers

This weekend, April 27-28, waterproofing work on the Roslyn Road Bridge in Mineola will affect Oyster Bay Br. service. Pick up special Oyster Bay Br. timetable or see http://bit.ly/XosGlM The trackwork results in the cancellation of the 5:51PM e/b train from Jamaica and the 5:20PM w/b train from Oyster Bay. Also, the 7:51PM and 9:51PM e/b trains from Jamaica will depart an hour later than regularly-scheduled times.

line.name: West Hempstead
line.text:
West Hempstead Branch: No Weekend Service

There is no weekend/holiday service on the West Hempstead Branch. As an alternative, customers are advised to use the Hempstead, Lynbrook, Valley Stream or Merillon Avenue stations (all located in Fare Zone 4).

line.name: Wassaic
line.text: Buses replace Wassaic Branch train service April 7 through June 2 between 9 AM and 5 PM on weekdays, and between 8 AM and 3 PM on Sundays to accommodate a rock slope remediation project. The bus schedule is included in the April 7 Harlem Line timetables. See http://bit.ly/9rsE8k for schedule. Customers seeking intermediate travel between Wassaic and Southeast must request the stop to the bus driver.  *Note:  Buses will only stop at intermediate stations when requested*
